trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: 现在我们会在“选择位置”屏幕上推荐一些体验良好的服务器位置。
trans-unit.source: We will now recommend a few of the highest-performing server locations when you’re on the Select location screen.

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: 我们更新了“排除应用”屏幕，可以更轻松地选择不受 VPN 保护的应用。
trans-unit.source: We’ve updated the App exclusions screen to make it easier to choose which apps to leave out of VPN protection.

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: 我们还修复了 bug，调整了界面并优化性能，让 Mozilla VPN 更加好用。
trans-unit.source: We’ve also made bug fixes, UI adjustments and other performance improvements to make Mozilla VPN even better.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: 请务必更新应用，以更轻松地保护自己的设备和在线活动！
trans-unit.source: Be sure to update the app to make it even easier to protect your devices and your activity online!

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: 请务必下载最新版本，以更轻松地保护自己的设备和在线活动！
trans-unit.source: Be sure to get the latest version to make it even easier to protect your devices and your activity online!

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: 我们发布了新版本 Mozilla VPN！马上下载即可获取以下最新功能及 bug 修复：
trans-unit.source: We’ve released an updated version of Mozilla VPN! Download it today to get the newest features and bug fixes:

trans-unit.target: 我们发布了新版本 Mozilla VPN！更新到最新版本即可获取以下最新功能和 bug 修复：
trans-unit.source: We’ve released an updated version of Mozilla VPN! Update to the latest version to get the newest features and bug fixes:
